name: df-cmet
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ccmet, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cfv(cmet, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cfv(ccfil, cv(s1)), wne(co(cfv(cmopn, cv(s1)), cflim, cv(s2)), emptycls)))))

comment: Define the set of complete metrics on a given set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
